articles.title: About this site
articles.contents:
This site tracks the duration of 2023 FBS college football games. It only includes information for games between two FBS teams and only for the 2023 season.
The goal is to track the duration and surface the data to analyze if there are any changes in game duration due to recent rule changes.
Data
The data used on this site is provided by SportsSource Analytics You can find similar data by purchasing one of the data packages.

The data is often corroborated using cfbfastR and stats.ncaa.org.

The duration is listed in minutes. The drives include “garbage time” drives, and does not filter out any data.
How this site was built
This website was built by me, Chris Gallo. I live in Charlotte, NC. Contact me at chris@hellogallo.com with any feedback.
This website uses the Distill framework for R Markdown. All data manipulation is done using R programming language.

articles.title: Home
articles.description: Tracking the game duration of 2023 college football games.
articles.contents:

Games


7

Avg Duration


204 mins


207 mins


Avg Plays


63.3 plays


68.7 plays



A total of 7 games have been played between FBS teams during the 2023 college football season.
The average games duration is 3 hours and 24 minutes.
The shortest game was 170 minutes and the longest game was 217 minutes.
You can a list of all game durations, including the combined drives and points for 2023 games here.
